title: Manual JSON Builder
description: Simulate JSON serialization by building a JSON string from a data class without any library imports.
instructions: Create a data class User(name, email, age) and a toJson() extension function that returns a valid JSON string. Print the JSON for a sample user.

hints.text: Use string templates to build the JSON manually
Strings in JSON need double quotes
Numbers in JSON don't need quotes

commonMistakes.correction: Wrap string values in escaped double quotes
Numbers should be unquoted in JSON
No comma after the last key-value pair
